name: Rodent People: Origins DEMO
description:
Rodent People: Origins is a VR escape room, in which teams of 2-4 players try to break out of a prison cell using their wits playing as cute little mice - Rodent People. 

This is a single player demo of the game, in which you can shoot some ducks and try to go for the high score. In the official game, this part will be crucial, so if you learn how to efficiently get loads of points, you're going to have easier time breaking out of the prison.

Yellow gun shoots yellow ducks, blue gun shoots blue ducks. If you shoot them all successfully fast, you're going to get X2 bonus. Do it extremely fast - and you will get an X3 bonus. 

You can find out more about the game by going to www.zenrepublic.space

We are also active on Instagram, so if you are using it, follow us https://www.instagram.com/zenrepublicofficial/
